external_references.description: DRAGOS. (2022, April 13). Pipedream: Chernovite’s Emerging Malware Targeting Industrial Control Systems. Retrieved September 28, 2022.
Jimmy Wylie. (2022, August). Analyzing PIPEDREAM: Challenges in Testing an ICS Attack Toolkit. Defcon 30.

Nathan Brubaker, Keith Lunden, Ken Proska, Muhammad Umair, Daniel Kapellmann Zafra, Corey Hildebrandt, Rob Caldwell. (2022, April 13). INCONTROLLER: New State-Sponsored Cyber Attack Tools Target Multiple Industrial Control Systems. Retrieved September 28, 2022.

objects.description: [INCONTROLLER](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1045) can wipe the memory of Omron PLCs and reset settings through the remote HTTP service.(Citation: Brubaker-Incontroller)(Citation: Dragos-Pipedream)(Citation: Wylie-22)
